mapper.select: SELECT a.TABLE_NAME "tableName", b.COMMENTS "tableDesc", a.COLUMN_NAME "columnName", a.DATA_TYPE "columnType", case when a.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' and a.DATA_SCALE is null then 'Long' when a.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR2' or a.DATA_TYPE = 'CLOB' then 'String' when a.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' and a.DATA_SCALE > 0 then 'BigDecimal' when a.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' and a.DATA_PRECISION = 1 and a.DATA_SCALE = 0 then 'Boolean' when a.DATA_TYPE = 'date' or a.DATA_TYPE = 'TIMESTAMP' then 'Date' else 'String' end "javaType", case when a.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' and a.DATA_PRECISION is not null and a.DATA_SCALE is not null then a.DATA_PRECISION else a.DATA_LENGTH end "length", decode(a.NULLABLE, 'Y', 1, 0) "isNull", a.DATA_DEFAULT "defaultValue", c.COMMENTS "columnDesc", case d.COLUMN_NAME when a.COLUMN_NAME then 1 else 0 end "isPk" FROM all_tab_cols a left join (select TABLE_NAME, COMMENTS from user_tab_comments) b on b.TABLE_NAME = a.TABLE_NAME left join (select TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, COMMENTS from USER_COL_COMMENTS) c on c.TABLE_NAME = a.TABLE_NAME and c.COLUMN_NAME = a.COLUMN_NAME left join (select ucc.TABLE_NAME, ucc.COLUMN_NAME from user_cons_columns ucc, user_constraints uc where uc.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' and uc.CONSTRAINT_NAME = ucc.CONSTRAINT_NAME) d on d.TABLE_NAME = a.TABLE_NAME WHERE a.table_name IN (select table_name from user_tables where TABLESPACE_NAME is not null and user = #{schemaName}) order by a.TABLE_NAME, a.COLUMN_ID
